changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure:
CREATE FUNCTION RuleEngine.IsCompositeAction(@ActionId int) RETURNS int AS BEGIN
DECLARE @NumberOfHits int DECLARE @ReturnValue int
SELECT @NumberOfHits = COUNT(1) FROM RuleEngine.CompositeActions Where Id = @ActionId
IF @NumberOfHits > 0 SET @ReturnValue = 1 ELSE SET @ReturnValue = 0
RETURN @ReturnValue
END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON RuleEngine.IsCompositeAction TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON RuleEngine.IsCompositeAction FROM db_apionly; DROP FUNCTION RuleEngine.IsCompositeAction;
